task_id.description: The ID of this allocation as a task

root_task_id.description: The ID of the earliest linked allocation in a chain

parent_task_id.description: The ID of the direct parent of a linked allocation

project_id.description: The ID of the project for this allocation

phase_id.description: The ID of the project phase for this allocation

people_id.description: The ID of the person assigned to the allocation (omit when using `people_ids` field)

people_ids.description: List of one or more people IDs assigned to the allocation (ignored if `people_id` is set)

billable.description: `1` = Billable, `0` = Non-billable - Billable status is set by the associated project task (`task_meta_id`), updates using this field are deprecated

name.description: Name of the associated project task

task_meta_id.description: The ID of the associated project task (named for backwards compatibility), takes higher priority over `name`

notes.description: Additional details about the work required

repeat_state.description: Frequency that this allocation repeats. `0` = No repeat, `1` = Weekly, `2` = Monthly, `3` = Every two weeks, `4` = Every three weeks, `5` = Every six weeks, `6` = Every two months, `7` = Every three months, `8` = Every six months, `9` = Yearly

repeat_end_date.description: Date that the repeating allocation will cease

modified.description: Date this record was last modified
